ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “I got hurt on my snowboard,
and now I can't go out for a while…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “Hey,
I'll give you my snowboard.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // “Tell me if you get good at it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “I wanted to get a lot
better at snowboarding…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // “My boy got hurt
right about the time we moved here…”{PAUSE}“I never shoulda got him that snowboard.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // “I can't live in this town anymore.
It gets so cold here!”{PAUSE}“I have to move again…
I don't know where to start.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // “The reason for the drop in temperature must be
because of that dome of light
at the Northern limits…”{PAUSE}“You all should get away from here and
go to a place like
{CYAN}Mideel Island in the south{WHITE}.”

dialogStrings:
“I got hurt on my snowboard,
and now I can't go out for a while…”
“Tell me if you get good at it.”

“I wanted to get a lot
better at snowboarding…”

“My boy got hurt
right about the time we moved here…”{PAUSE}“I never shoulda got him that snowboard.”

“I can't live in this town anymore.
It gets so cold here!”{PAUSE}“I have to move again…
I don't know where to start.”

“The reason for the drop in temperature must be
because of that dome of light
at the Northern limits…”{PAUSE}“You all should get away from here and
go to a place like
{CYAN}Mideel Island in the south{WHITE}.”
